justification: Proposal ignores Team B’s preference for consistency and RB stability; trading a Tier 1 RB (Noah Carter) weakens an 8-0 roster’s safest floor. Liam Wright is Tier 1 but a deep-threat in a low-volume offense (higher variance), misaligned with B’s tastes. Michael Roberts (Tier 4) is only a marginal TE upgrade. Rationale is generic and doesn’t address B’s actual incentives or playoff matchups, and p_accept is overstated. Good for A’s RB need, poor fit for B.
